name: biomni-query-monarch
title: Biomni: Query Monarch
description: Query the Monarch Initiative for integrated genotype-phenotype data connecting human diseases with model organisms.
content:
Overview

Searches the Monarch Initiative, integrating phenotype and disease data across species. Links human diseases with animal models through computational phenotype comparison enabling translational research.

Input Parameters

  • prompt (string, optional): Natural language query about genes, diseases, or phenotypes
  • endpoint (string, optional): Specific Monarch API endpoint
  • max_results (integer, optional): Maximum results to return
  • verbose (boolean, optional): Enable detailed logging

Biological Use Case

Essential for translational research. Researchers use Monarch to find animal models, identify orthologous genes, compare phenotypes across species, prioritize candidate disease genes, and discover gene-disease associations through cross-species analysis.

Output

Returns JSON (monarch_results.json) with gene-phenotype associations, disease-model mappings, orthology relationships, phenotype terms, cross-species comparisons, evidence, and literature references.

Category

database
